quoteText:
Account Information
If you would at any time like to review or change the information in your account or terminate your account, you can:
  • Log into your account settings and update your user account.
Upon your request to terminate your account, we will deactivate or delete your account and information from our active databases.
title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time
